content.description: Start in the middle of the wall where the tree is, under the overhang on a left crimp and right pocket. Climb out to the ledge at about 7', curl up into it to get a short rest, then prepare yourself for a somewhat sketchy finish up the headwall to a slopey topout. I did this without spotters and man do I wish I had friends. Scout the topout before you get up there, and don't fall into the tree.
content.location: center of the wall behind the tree

content.description: A steep overhang leading to a vertical headwall. There could be some easy climbs on the far left and far right sides of this wall, but in the main section there's gonna be hard, thin climbs. Definitely potential for some hard hard mono climbs with sketchy dirty topouts This is obviously a local party spot, if the litter and trash is any indication. FYI there was a large beehive on the far left side of this wall, there were no bees but it looked scary af
